name: ZPPSU ID SYSTEN
desc: The ZPPSU ID System is a secure and efficient identification management system for Zamboanga Peninsula Polytechnic State University (ZPPSU).

name: Immersion System
desc: The Senior High School Immersion System is a web-based application designed to manage and streamline the work immersion program for senior high school students.

name: Zc Multi-Catering Web-App
desc: The ZC Multi-Catering Web App is a dynamic and user-friendly platform designed to streamline catering services, bookings, and order management.

name: ZPPSU- Admission System
desc: The ZPPSU Admission System is a web-based application designed to streamline the student admission process for Zamboanga Peninsula Polytechnic State University (ZPPSU).

name: Health Care -Profiling System
desc: The Health Care Profiling System is a web-based application designed to efficiently manage and maintain patient records, medical history, and health assessments.

name: ZC-Digital Marketing  Learning System | with Mobile App
desc: ZC-Digital Marketing Learning System is an interactive platform that teaches essential digital marketing skills, including SEO, social media, PPC, email marketing, and analytics. With expert-led courses, real-world case studies, and hands-on exercises, it offers practical learning and AI-driven insights. Ideal for students, professionals, and entrepreneurs, ZC helps users stay competitive and advance their careers.
